home.title: The right way to kill your friends..
home.game_resume:
An evening with friends... How about adding a little atmosphere by making all these nice people kill each other?
 Killer Party is a simple party game that can be played throughout an evening or a meal.
home.create_room_error: An error has occured while creating a new room. Please retry later.
home.room_code_label: Type the code of the room to join

join_room.create_pseudo: You must create a pseudo before joining this room.
join_room.careful_before_join_room: Be careful, if you join this room, this will make you leave the previous one.

room.join_room_code: The code to join this room is {roomCode}.
room.missions_in_room: There is currently {missionsCount} missions in this room.
room.missions_description: Specify your informations and add new missions to the room.
room.create_mission: Create a new mission to add in the room
room.mission_input: Make him drink his glass dry
room.add_mission: Add this mission in the room
room.players_list_description: List of all the killers who will have to kill each other.
room.share_room_link: Share link to join the room
room.share_room_link_copy_paste:
Copy and paste the following link:
 {joinRoomLink}
room.share_room_text: Hey! Join my party and try to kill me ^^
room.leave_room_warning:
You are about to leave the room.
 Are you sure about this?
room.kick_room_warning:
You are going to kick {playerName}.
 Are you sure about this?
room.delete_room_placeholder: Confirm by typing the room code

playing_room.target_section_title: Try to kill your target and survive!
playing_room.mission_to_do: In order to kill your target, it must do..
playing_room.killed_button_infos: Click on the button above to notify other players that you have been killed.
playing_room.player_killed_resume: Dead men tell no tales.. You just have to wait for the end of the game.
playing_room.player_killed_modal_text: You will not be able to play this party anymore and be considered as dead!

layout.restricted_access: Access to Killer Party from a third party app is restricted for game experience reasons.
layout.how_to_play: Okay, but how can we play?
layout.click_button_bellow: By clicking on the button below, you can copy and paste the link directly into your browser.
layout.link_saved_explanation: Go to your mobile browser and simply paste the link to access our application!

not_found.title: Oops, something goes wrong!
not_found.text: The room you requested can not be found.
